tool_description: Access the official Czech Republic government company register, ideal for KYB purposes
name: Czech Republic Company Data
title: Czech Republic Company Data

api_list.name: Company Search by ICO
api_list.description: Search a company by it's czech ICO number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://czech-republic-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/ekonomicke-subjekty-v-be/rest/ekonomicke-subjekty-res/64582931"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "czech-republic-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://czech-republic-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/ekonomicke-subjekty-v-be/rest/ekonomicke-subjekty-res/{ico}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "czech-republic-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
